TestCase.TestCaseObjective: A MIP4 Base Consumer is able to achieve Nominal Recovery of the current situation utilizing Request/Response Exchange Patterns.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Base Consumer (A) loses data and requires a re-synchronization of Current Situation from Producer (B).
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: MIP4SLT1_1221 - Consumer (A) is a Base Consumer exchanging data with Provider (B) through a Request/Response pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Consumer successfully requests and receives a re-synchronization of the current situation data from the Producer through the Request/Response exchange pattern.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: A Base Consumer (A) requires re-synchronization of the current situation from Provider (B) and requests a standalone update utilizing the Request/Response Exchange Pattern.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Provider (B) receives Request from Consumer (A) and successfully provides a Situation Update utilizing the Request Response Exchange Pattern.
